casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Michael REED 365A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2016

Mr. Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, For Reed, David Michael.

Mr. E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Ms. Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of November 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of November 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 13th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
